text:
Primity Bio | On-Site Full Time (San Francisco Bay Area) | Front End Devs

Like life sciences and big data? We're building a real-time analysis platform for biological data and are looking for seasoned Angular devs to join our team!

Ideally you are an active follower of the Angular community (e.g. familiar with the component tree architecture of angular 2/1.5 and best practices for performance), and are familiar with web sockets and testing frameworks like Protractor.

Contact my username at primitybio.com
